sn12.49:4.4: kismiṃ sati kiṃ hoti, kissuppādā kiṃ uppajjati?
sn12.49:4.5: Kismiṃ sati saṅkhārā honti, kismiṃ sati viññāṇaṃ hoti, kismiṃ sati nāmarūpaṃ hoti, kismiṃ sati saḷāyatanaṃ hoti, kismiṃ sati phasso hoti, kismiṃ sati vedanā hoti, kismiṃ sati taṇhā hoti, kismiṃ sati upādānaṃ hoti, kismiṃ sati bhavo hoti, kismiṃ sati jāti hoti, kismiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī’ti?
sn12.49:5.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti:
sn12.49:5.2: ‘imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati<span class=\"var\" title=\" etthantare pāṭho ka-sī, syā1-3 potthakesu natthi. tathā sati anantarasuttaṭīkāya\" id=\"note66\">.
sn12.49:6.1: Na, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa evaṃ hoti:
sn12.49:6.3: kismiṃ asati kiṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā kiṃ nirujjhati?
sn12.49:6.4: Kismiṃ asati saṅkhārā na honti, kismiṃ asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti, kismiṃ asati nāmarūpaṃ na hoti, kismiṃ asati saḷāyatanaṃ na hoti, kismiṃ asati phasso na hoti, kismiṃ asati vedanā na hoti, kismiṃ asati taṇhā na hoti, kismiṃ asati upādānaṃ na hoti, kismiṃ asati bhavo na hoti, kismiṃ asati jāti na hoti, kismiṃ asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hotī’ti?
sn12.49:7.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti:
sn12.49:7.2: ‘imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati<span class=\"var\" title=\" etthantare pāṭhopi tattha tatheva\" id=\"note70\">.
